data.description: The wall line count represents the number of walls in a print. This can be set instead of setting a thickness in millimeter of the walls.
data.img_description: The model on the left has 3 walls, the model on the right has two walls.
data.hints:
- When you set the wall line count, the wall thickness is calculated and will grey out.
- Check the wall thickness when changing nozzle size, because the wall line count does not automatically change when set manually.
